doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 11 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 128[Air Date: 12/4/1984]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 11 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 128[Air Date: 12/4/1984]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. Nancy Roth, executive director of Gay Rights National Lobby, discusses history of National Gay Rights BillCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper2. [Greg Merkus] discusses upcoming Winter Solstice fundraiser at the new Community Center3. Dr. Mervin Silverman talks to New York Physicians For Human Rights discussing his concerns over the re-opening of bathhouses in San FranciscoCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"4. "Black and White Men Together" members Lidell Jackson and Mitchell Karp discuss racial discriminationCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp5. Keith O'Connor, NYC Human Rights Commission, discusses gay discriminationCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janiero, The Islanders Club6. Judges decision in the Dronenberg case challenges right to privacyCOMMERCIAL: "The Gascon," a novel by John Colin Penford7. Report on the test for HTLV and fears of misuseCOMMERCIAL: Arco Blancos resort, San Juan, Puerto Rico8. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Topic: Mental Health, Depression during the holidays. Interview with Chuck Jones, Director of Intake, GMHCCOMMERCIAL: Badlands, NYC gay bar9. Sports reportCOMMERCIAL: World of Video10. Current Events
GCN Special Presentation: "Whispers," a gay docudramaCOMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"COMMERCIAL: World of Video1. "Whispers," a gay docudramaCOMMERCIAL: "The Gascon," a novel by John Colin Penford
